actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tiger makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack. If both attacks hit one creature, the target must succeed on a DC 13 CON save at the start of its next turn or lose 5 (2d4) HP, as the wound continues bleeding.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. _Hit:_ 6 (1d6+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d4+3) slashing damage.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Smell
special_abilities.desc: The tiger's Perception is 18 when perceiving by smell.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the tiger moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the tiger can make one Bite attack against it as a bonus action.
